sentences.en: He patented the idea that the atom could be split.
sentences.cn: 他得到了原子可以分裂的这个见解的专利。

sentences.en: Neutrons and protons are bound together in the nucleus of an atom.
sentences.cn: 在一个原子的核内，中子和质子聚合在一起。

sentences.en: A molecule of water consists of two atoms of hydrogen and one atom of oxygen.
sentences.cn: 水分子由两个氢原子和一个氧原子构成。
